summary:
Hi!
My name is Xandra and I'm a 3D Environment Artist with multiple years of professional experience in the game industry and a BA in Game Art.

I love working in a passionate team that cares for each other and the projects they are working on. My specialty is within 3D stylized game art for various platforms.
